room_title: Escape room "The Heist" by Trapped Puzzle Rooms in Minneapolis - St. Paul
review: Had a wonderful time with 3 generations of family. So excited that we escaped!

room_title: Escape room "The Heist" by Trapped Puzzle Rooms in Minneapolis - St. Paul
review: Had a blast escaping "The Heist" today. I wasn't sure what to expect from this experience, but you did not disappoint! Clues were difficult but not impossible and gave you a great feeling of success when solved. If you can impress my teens, you've done well! Already planning our next escape!

room_title: Escape room "The Heist" by Trapped Puzzle Rooms in Minneapolis - St. Paul
review: My friends and I went to the Heist Room. The storyline and clues were super creative and made our experience great!

room_title: Escape room "The Heist" by Trapped Puzzle Rooms in Minneapolis - St. Paul
review: We just did the Heist tonight. What a fun time! We booked the whole room with some friends and our kids and everyone had a great time. And while it's clearly not designed FOR kids, ours were able to contribute and help figure out the clues. Thanks for providing such a fun outing!
